convertRules:
# Line head conversion
# Note: this rule can't apply to the very first line of the document



'varx|' -> '`Variable`|'

'statx|' -> '*Static*|'

'charx|' ->'`char`|'

'flox|'-> '`float`|'

'dux|'-> '`double`|'

'intx|' -> '`int`|'

'lintx|' -> '`long int`|'

'ldblx|' -> '`long double`|'

profiles.title: global

# Line head conversion
